name: Void Whispers
description:
What if the reason for our universe being so vast and yet so silent is darker than we think? What if we are destined to perish, hunted by an ancient civilization that destroys every new life that thrives and attempts to reach out to the cosmos?



Void Whispers is set in the 1940s, and you play as Mike, a newcomer to Cosmo City working as a broadcast engineer. Your task is to master the use of radio equipment to broadcast the latest news to the town folks, all while mysterious events unfold in the sky.

Key features:

  • 30 to 40 minutes of gameplay
  • 3 different endings to discover
  • Work as a broadcast engineer, learning how to operate all the machines, interact with the public, play some old music, and more.
  • Intriguing narrative
  • Immersive sound design
  • A true horror experience
  • Aliens (but not the gray one)
